songs.title: Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken
songs.lyrics: Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken, All to Leave..

songs.title: Glory to His Name
songs.lyrics: Down at the Cross where my Saviour,

songs.title: When I Survey
songs.lyrics: When I Survey the wondrous cross

songs.title: Beneath the Cross of Jesus
songs.lyrics: Beneath the Cross of Jesus I fain would take...

songs.title: I Gave My Life for Thee
songs.lyrics: I gave my life for thee...

songs.title: I am Coming to the Cross
songs.lyrics: I am coming to the cross, I am poor...

songs.title: Room at the Cross
songs.lyrics: The cross upon which Jesus died...

songs.title: Near the Cross
songs.lyrics: Jesus, keep me near the cross
